title: The most frequent daily users of social media
summary: This chart shows the most frequent daily in Minutes on The in media Age Group .
From the chart , we see that people around 15 - 24 spend 124 Minutes The on , followed media people around 25 - 34 spend around 72 Minutes .
People in the Age Group 35 - 44 are the lowest amount of people that spend 70 Minutes on The .
gold: The graph compares the daily minutes spent on social media by users from 5 ages groups . The overall age range is from 15 to 64 years . Users aged 45 - 54 are the most frequent daily users with an average of 150 minutes spent on social media .
